column4: Clear site - Measure 2m beyond perimeter of building
column9: Building 10m x 12m, perimeter (10+12)x2=44m, area with 2m margin = (14x16)=224m2

column4: Strip topsoil - Measure 1m beyond perimeter of building
Excavate for surface trenches - 700mm wide x 1500mm deep
Risk of collapse - Take area of both sides of excavation
Mass concrete footings - 700 x 250mm deep x length of footings
Reinforcement - Take as 100kg per m3 of concrete

column9: 6 columns x (0.3m x 4 sides) x 2.5m height = 18m2

column4: Brick reinforcement - 2.94m per m2 of brickwork

column9: Building width 12m, trusses at 1.5m centers = 8 trusses
